name: Zombie fest arena
description:
Introduction

Your job is to clear the map of all zombies. 

Keep an eye on your health. Pick up the health packs and drive to a H zone to charge it back up.

Your fuel is also going to run out. Collect the fuel tanks and go to a F zone to fill your tank up.

Scrap can be used on the U pad to charge up your armour.

There are currently a small amount of maps for the prototype.

Controls:

Move - AWSD/Arrows keys or triggers on controller

Drop bomb - main action button if you have picked them up

Main action button - left mouse or A on controller

Menu - Esc or start on controller

Good luck!

Development

I have been creating this game for a couple of weeks. It has plenty of rough edges but you should get the idea. I have lots of more things I wanted to add but it will take quite some time to get there.
